name: Bunker935
description:
The Game is in a really early State and will therefore probably have some Bugs!

I released this Demo for everyone to Test and review the Game

If you download the game please make sure to write a review in the comments of this page and tell me what to add in the future 

I also appreciate everyone wanting to ulpoad a Video of the Demo on their youtube Channel, if you do so  please talk about what you liked and disliked about the game and send your video in the comments below 

Also make sure to follow me on itch if you like my content

greetings,   L o c o   :)
